articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Kun Ha
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Kun Ha
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Kun Ha, a recipient of Order of Kim Il Sung and former political official of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School and, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on Wednesday.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz, and through him, to the Communist Party of Cuba and the government and people of the Republic of Cuba on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Cuba.
					
					 Expressing belief that the fraternal friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries established and consolidated in the joint struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism would as ever grow stronger, the message sincerely wished him bigger successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State of the Republic of Cuba, on August 14.
					 Raul in his message extended the warmest congratulations to the Workers' Party of Korea, the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the party, government and people of Cuba on the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of Cuba and the DPRK.
					
					 He assured Kim Jong Un of his will to steadily strengthen the long-standing fraternal relations between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Peruvian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Peruvian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Juan Carlos Capunay, Peruvian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Greetings to Hungarian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Hungarian President
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Ader Janos,  president of Hungary, on Thursday on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the president of Hungary success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the two peoples.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Prime Minister of Thailand
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Prime Minister of Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Prayuth Chanocha, prime minister of the Kingdom of Thailand, as regards a recent huge explosion that hit it, claiming a lot of casualties and material losses.
					 The message expressed deep condolences to the prime minister, and through him, to the bereaved families and victims.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on August 12.
					 In the message the president said on behalf of the government and people of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea and on his own behalf, he extended the most heartfelt and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the occasion of August 15, 2015, the 70th anniversary of Korea.
					
					 Availing himself of that opportunity, he reaffirmed his will to further develop the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples of the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea, wishing the DPRK peace, progress and peace.
					
					 He offered the most heartfelt regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj on Aug. 15. 
					 The president in the message offered sincere greetings to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on his own behalf and on behalf of the Mongolian people on the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 He was pleased over the fact that the relations between the two countries expand in all fields of society and the two countries cooperate with each other for peace and security of the region and the Korean Peninsula, the message said.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and his family happiness and the friendly Korean people prosperity and development.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Angolan President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Angolan President
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of the Republic of Angola, on August 15.
					 The president in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the Angolan government and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Greeting this important day of the Korean people, he said he was rejoiced over the fact that the government and people of the DPRK are working hard to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country and achieve its socio-economic development.
					
					 Wishing the Korean people happiness and prosperity, he reaffirmed the invariable will of the Angolan government to strengthen the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Warns S. Korean Military to Act with Discretion
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Warns S. Korean Military to Act with Discretion
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued the following urgent report on Thursday:
					 War maniacs of the south Korean puppet military made another grave provocation to the DPRK in the central western sector of the front on Thursday afternoon.
					
					 They perpetrated such reckless action as firing 36 shells at KPA civil police posts under the absurd pretext that the KPA fired one shell at the south side. Six shells of them hit the area near KPA civil police posts 542 and 543 and other 15 shells fell near KPA civil police posts 250 and 251.
					
					 There was no victim of the shelling provocation.
					
					 However, this reckless shelling on the DPRK's military posts, its inviolable territory is a serious military provocation that can never be pardoned.
					
					 Gravity of the situation is that the south Korean puppet military didn't hesitate to make such provocation though it has not yet confirmed where a shell allegedly fired by the KPA came from and where it fell in its side, unaware of whether it was an AA gun shell or a bullet or a rocket or not.
					
					 Shortly ago, the puppet war maniacs resumed the broadcasting for psychological warfare in all sectors of the front under the pretext of a doubtful mine explosion case. Today they fired shells en masse toward the territory of the DPRK without scientific grounds. All of them are prompted by insanity of the south Korean military war maniacs for provocation.
					
					 In view of the prevailing crucial situation, an emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea will be convened at Thursday night.
					
					 We are now sharply following the south Korean puppet Defense Ministry's attitude toward the ultimatum of the KPA General Staff which declared that a strong military action would be launched unless they stop the broadcasting for anti-DPRK psychological warfare and dismantle all means of psychological warfare within 48 hours.
					
					 Foolhardy provocation deserves harsh punishment.
					
					 The south Korean military war maniacs should behave with discretion, well aware of the retaliatory spirit running high among the angry servicepersons of the KPA frontline combined units.

articles.title: Home-Visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Home-Visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Han Pong Hui, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left here on Thursday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates left here on Thursday after taking part in the international solidarity event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 They included a delegation of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, a delegation of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, a secretary of the New Zealand-DPRK Society and his party, co-secretary general of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea who doubles as delegate of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula and the managing director of Hike Korea.
					
					 Leaving earlier was a delegate of the Ireland-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation to mark the 60th anniversary of the formation of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by chairman Kim Yong Ju visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 Members of delegation paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of People's Armed Forces
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Military attaches corps here visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Thursday ahead of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the ministry and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round historical mementoes and materials, being briefed on the history of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolution.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation led by Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), visited the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage Thursday.
					 Being briefed on the fact that orphans' homes was wonderfully built on the bank of the River Taedong under the warm care of Marshal Kim Jong Un, members of the delegation went round rooms for education, rooms for sleeping and wading pools, etc.
					
					 They were deeply impressed to see the orphans leading a happy life.
					
					 They also toured the International Friendship Exhibition House, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, etc.

articles.title: European Regional Delegation for Friendship and Cultural Exchange Visits Kumsong School
articles.content:
European Regional Delegation for Friendship and Cultural Exchange Visits Kumsong School
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The European regional delegation for friendship and cultural exchange led by Morten Traavik, director of the Traavik Art Company of Norway, visited Kumsong School on Thursday. 
					 Being briefed on the school which has modern educational equipment and facilities, members of the delegation went round different classrooms. 
					
					 They enjoyed a performance given by the students of the school. 
					
					 Put on the stage were also pieces given by students of the school and members of the Laibach Band of Slovenia.

articles.title: 5th Rason International Trade Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
5th Rason International Trade Exhibition Opens
						
 Rason, August 20 (KCNA) -- The 5th Rason International Trade Exhibition opened in Rason City with due ceremony on Thursday.
					 Displayed at the exhibition are electric and electronic products, light industrial goods, foodstuff, daily necessities, medicines, agricultural and marine products, household articles and vehicles presented by of at least 90 units of the DPRK, Russia, Germany, Dominica, Italy, China, Canada and other countries. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il displayed in the Rason Exhibition Hall and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee who is also chairman of the organizing committee of the exhibition, officials concerned, people in the city, and the Russian consul-general in Chongjin, delegates of different countries, those who presented products to the exhibition and foreign businessmen active in the Rason economic and trade zone.
					
					 An opening address and congratulatory speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers said that the beautiful port city of Rason has become the venue of the 5th Rason International Trade Exhibition thanks to the common aspiration and sincere efforts of governments, enterprises and trading companies of different countries.
					
					  They noted that DPRK is developing foreign trade and actively accelerating technical modernization of the national economy on the basis of the latest science and technology and has already laid an institutional and legal groundwork for developing and revitalizing economic and trade zones.
					
					 They said that the exhibition would offer a good opportunity for promoting friendship and solidarity among countries and further developing economy and trade.
					
					 There took place a reception that day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Observe Important Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Observe Important Day of DPRK
 Chongjin, August 20 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen at Chongjin Port, North Hamgyong Province on Thursday to mark the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The participants laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captains and crewmen of Niue-flagged ship Hao Fan 6 and Hao Fan 2.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il performed feats before the country, revolution, the era and history, providing energetic Songun leadership for a long period since he started the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the Korean people could smash every invasion move and challenge of the imperialists and thus creditably protect the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 He categorically thwarted the moves of the imperialists and international reactionaries to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of other countries and nations and led to victory the cause of human independence for building a new peaceful world by dint of Songun politics.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the Korean people would always enjoy victories and glories thanks to the Songun idea founded by the preceding leaders and under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) held a seminar at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers. 
					
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., UAWK, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, Juche 49 (1960) and this was a historic event which declared that the Korean revolution that started and has advanced with the arms has entered the new era for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the Korean revolution could make a long drive despite all storms of history, they said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to his high-intensity forced march of patriotic devotion, the service personnel and people of the DPRK could work historic miracles unprecedented in the history of mankind.
					
					 He provided a solid foundation for achieving prosperity of the country and carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche. Thanks to his Songun revolutionary exploits, the service personnel and people of the DPRK are dynamically advancing toward the final victory holding aloft the banner of Songun under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The speakers called upon all the officials of UAWK and agricultural workers to fulfill duties as masters responsible for the granary of the country on the agricultural front, who work on the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism upholding the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Symposium of Workers and Members of GFTUK on Sharing Experience in Scientific and Technological Innovations Held
articles.content:
Symposium of Workers and Members of GFTUK on Sharing Experience in Scientific and Technological Innovations Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A symposium of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) across the country on sharing experience in scientific and technological innovations was held at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday.
					 Published there were achievements and experience gained in the movement for creating Lathe No. 26 model machine and massive technological innovation movement in the past.
					
					 Speakers said they have contributed to building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard by managing equipment as required by science and technology and putting production processes on a CNC basis.
					
					 They dealt with scientific and technological achievements made by them in putting national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis while giving fullest play to the might of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 They noted that they have briskly conducted massive technological innovation movement and the movement of the February 17 shock brigade of scientists and technicians in the pilot sectors and major industrial sectors of the national economy in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 They vow to glorify the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by devoting themselves to developing science and technology of the country and discharge the mission and duty of the Korean working class in the Songun era by taking the lead in the drive for implementing the behests of the great leaders and defending the party's policies.
					
					 Present at the symposium were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, officials concerned and officials of the GFTUK.

articles.title: Presentation of Sci-tech Successes in Rare-Earth Application Technology Held
articles.content:
Presentation of Sci-tech Successes in Rare-Earth Application Technology Held
						
 Wonsan, August 20 (KCNA) -- There took place a national presentation of sci-tech successes in the field of rare-earth application technology at Wonsan University of Agriculture on Wednesday and Thursday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 It was attended by scientists, technicians, teachers in the field of rare-earth application technology including those of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					
					 Various papers were read out there to introduce successes and experience gained in prospecting and refining rare-earth resources and manufacturing rare-earth products with latest science and technology.
					
					 A lecture was given on the recent trend of rare-earth industry development and sci-tech issues of improving the quality of rare-earth products and decreasing their production costs.

articles.title: Spiral Wind-driven Generator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Spiral Wind-driven Generator Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Aeguk Magnet Factory under the Ministry of Electronics Industry in the DPRK developed a spiral wind-driven generator with a capacity of 100~300W and established the process for its production.
					 According to its manager Kim Chol Song, the newly-developed generator is able to produce electricity even at low velocity of wind.
					
					 With low noise and vibration, this spiral generator can be used in any area with a mean annual wind velocity of 2m/s. Its startup wind velocity is 0.8~1m/s.
					
					 The generator is available in towns as it is 11 percent higher than a propeller wind-driven generator in energy conversion efficiency and a fifth lower in noise level. 
					
					 It won a high appraisal at the national exhibition of inventions and new technologies recently held to mark the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and the national liberation.

articles.title: Kwangpho Duck Listed as Natural Heritage in DPRK
articles.content:
Kwangpho Duck Listed as Natural Heritage in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Kwangpho Duck was listed as natural heritage in the DPRK.
					 It is highly resistant to epidemics and low in feed consumption.
					
					 It weighs 3.5 to 4 kilograms for drake and 3 to 3.5 kilograms for duck.
					
					 It lays as many as 150 to 160 eggs a year, each one weighing 60 to 90 grams.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung sent hatching eggs to the Kwangpho Duck Farm in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953). The President gave detailed instructions to acclimatize it and named it Kwangpho Duck.
					
					 The farm, located in Jongphyong County, South Hamgyong Province, has still preserved its purebred.

articles.title: Sinchon Museum Enhances Hatred toward U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
Sinchon Museum Enhances Hatred toward U.S. Imperialism
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Sinchon Museum was newly built in the DPRK as a center for anti-U.S. class education.
					 At the museum, there are the general introductory room, exhibition rooms, video room, general lecture room, bomb shelter, the ground for having a meeting to vow vengeance and other places.
					
					 On display there are remains of those who were slaughtered by the U.S. aggression troops and class enemies in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province during the Korean War (1950-1953).
					
					 All the exhibits instill into visitors the truth that the illusion about enemy leads to death and they should settle accounts with the U.S. brutes and class enemies by means of arms.

articles.title: International Scientific Conference to Be Held
articles.content:
International Scientific Conference to Be Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The International Scientific Conference-2015 of Kim Il Sung University will be held on August 25 and 26.
					 Published at the conference on the theme of "Scientific development and building of highly civilized nation" will be recent research achievements in the fields of mathematics, medical science, life science and agricultural science.
					
					 It will bring together prestigious scholars of Kim Il Sung University and other universities and scientific research institutions of different countries.

articles.title: Red Tide Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Red Tide Hits S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Red tide hit the waters off Koje Island, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea, according to south Korean KBS Monday.
					 The steady rise of temperature caused breeding of bacteria leading to red tide that reportedly killed 170 000 fishes in a fish culture ground in the waters. The red tide is rapidly spreading in the waters off the southern coast of Korea, raising concerns for greater damage.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Halt to UFG
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Halt to UFG
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held press conferences in Seoul and other parts of south Korea simultaneously on August 17, demanding a halt to Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military drills kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean war maniacs.
					 Recalling that the "tailored deterrent strategy" would be comprehensively applied in UFG, the organization noted that the drills being staged pursuant to OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5029 are a war rehearsal to make a preemptive strike at the north in the light of their nature, troops and hardware.
					
					 The drills are also designed to meet the military interests of the U.S. and Japan including the establishment of the triangular military alliance, it charged, urging the U.S. and the south Korean regime to immediately stop the risky drills.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Reckless War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Reckless War Drills 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- More than 30 south Korean organizations held a press conference near the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 17 denouncing the joint military drills for aggression, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. They included the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, People's Action for Peace against War, Solidarity for Progress, Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Peasants Associations. 
					 They disclosed that the south Korean and the U.S. authorities hurled more than 80 000 aggression troops and at least 400 000 civilians into the Ulji Freedom Guardian war drills. 
					
					 They denounced the south Korean authorities for resorting to the moves of fostering conflicts with the north, notably the resumption of broadcasting aimed at psychological warfare and leaflet-scattering, and for openly crying out for "strike at the command of the north." 
					
					 They demanded the south Korean and the U.S. authorities withdraw the policy for preemptive attack and offensive operational plan and stop the war drills at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Achieving Peace and Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Achieving Peace and Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on August 15 at which it declared it would certainly check the Japanese government's moves for revival of militarism and reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula.
					 A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					 It said that Japanese Prime Minister Abe's anachronistic statement is little short of a declaration of war that calls for rendering defunct the peace constitution, exercising the "right to collective self-defense" with the backing of the U.S. and igniting a war of aggression again.
					
					 It is also a declaration against humanity that confirms its will to totally deny apology, reflection and state reparation for the past crimes, it charged.
					
					 It said that the U.S. is trying to introduce the "Self-Defense Forces" into the Korean Peninsula under the plea of tightening military alliance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Message Posted on German Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Message Posted on German Website
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's message of congratulations to the women football players who won the title of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asian Cup was posted on the website of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on Aug. 10.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- An event for laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung took place at the building of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on Aug. 14 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait and paid tribute to the President.
					
					 Present there were the secretary general and other staff members of the organization, Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy officials.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Political Figure of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Political Figure of DR Congo 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean people achieved the national liberation, became dignified people in the international arena and worked a miracle of defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the sun of the nation.
					 Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, said this in a statement on Aug. 8 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of struggle to liberate his country and nation, founded the Juche idea which defined that the popular masses are masters of revolution and construction and they promote the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Juche idea was successfully applied in the DPRK.
					
					 Its vitality and validity are proved by the achievements made by the Korean people under the leadership of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a harmonious whole where all the people are united in single mind around the leader.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea enjoys the absolute support from the popular masses.
					
					 Thus, socialist Korea is advancing in defiance of the imperialist allied forces' aggression moves.
					
					 The DPRK will emerge victorious and prosperous, displaying its dignity before the world under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Spain, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Spain, Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Spain and Indonesia on Aug. 9 and 10 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The secretary general of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain who doubles as chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea explained the main content of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					
					 Speakers praised President Kim Il Sung as the lodestar of Korea's reunification who advanced the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--and devoted his whole life to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. H.E. Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly brilliant Songun commander who developed the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and nuclear weapons state with his invincible Songun politics, they noted.
					
					 The general secretary of the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain said the President's exploit of liberating Korea provided an everlasting inspiring banner not only to the Korean people but to the world anti-imperialist independent people aspiring after socialism.

articles.title: Italian, Thai Figures Release Statements on 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Italian, Thai Figures Release Statements on 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Italian and Thai figures issued statements on Aug. 13 and 15 in celebration of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Communist Party of Italy, said:
					
					 The Communist Party of Italy is significantly celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 We still admire the heroic struggle of the Korean people for national liberation. 
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is steadily advancing the anti-imperialist cause. 
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, noted President Kim Il Sung carried out a protracted hard-fought struggle to liberate the country.
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea and fully relied on the Korean people in the days of struggle, the chairman noted, and went on:
					
					 He founded the DPRK after the country's liberation.
					
					 He is revered not only by the Korean people but by the world progressive people for his winning back the country and resurrecting the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Receptions, seminar, meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Nakhodka of Russia, Cambodia, Germany, Equatorial Guinea and Egypt on Aug. 13 and 14 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Shown at the film shows were Korean films including "The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 Speakers including officials of the mission of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Vladivostok and the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party said the exploits performed by the peoples of the two countries against the Japanese imperialists, their common enemy, would be handed down forever, saying that Aug. 15 is a meaningful day of great historic significance for Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 They stressed that Russia-DPRK friendship provided by the great leaders is further developing under the deep care of President Putin and H.E. Kim Jong Un and it is making positive contribution to peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia in his speech praised Kim Il Sung as the great father of the Korean nation who realized the country's liberation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over it through fifteen years of anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that Kim Il Sung realized the country's liberation seventy years ago and thus achieved the exploits before the Korean nation and instilled the faith in victory into progressive humankind.
					
					 The administrative director of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea in a speech said that Kim Il Sung who is enjoying the boundless reverence of the progressive people was the peerless patriot who led the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and liberated the Korean people from the destinies of the colonial slaves and built a powerful country in which the people became genuine masters and outstanding elder statesman who led the cause of human independence to victory.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Regional Body
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Regional Body
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- For the Korean people the country's liberation meant not only national restoration but also a historic event in which a decisive turn was brought about in their destinies.
					 Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, said this in his article titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history" posted on a website on Aug. 12 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 He said that the Korean people could enjoy the independent and dignified life as proud masters of their destinies, state and society after having been freed from the Japanese imperialists' colonial slaves thanks to the country's liberation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 A people's power was established and democratic reforms were successfully carried out in the northern half of Korea in a short period under the leadership of the party and thus the people became masters of the power, factories and the land and women were freed from feudal fetters that had persisted for thousands of years.
					
					 The DPRK has pushed forward the military affairs with more priority given to it than other work guided by the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il and by firmly adhering to the principles of Juche in thinking, independence in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in defence.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea became a mother party which takes care of the destiny of the popular masses and leads them, the people's power became responsible for their life and the people's army defender of their freedom and happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz 
						
　Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 19 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					　La misiva extiende las calidas felicitaciones al destinatario, y por su conducto, al Partido Comunista de Cuba, al gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Cuba, con motivo del 55o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y la Republica de Cuba y continua:
					
					　Convencido de que las fraternales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises establecidas, consolidadas y desarrolladas en medio de la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro tambien, le deseo de todo corazon mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador peruano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador peruano 
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- Juan Carlos Capunay presento este jueves en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Peruana en la RPDC. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente hungaro por dia nacional
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente hungaro por dia nacional 
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Hungria, Ader Janos, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais europeo.
					El remitente desea los exitos al destinatario en su trabajo para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y expresa su conviccion de que las relaciones entre Corea y Hungria se ampliaran y se desarrollaran conforme al interes comun y el deseo de los pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.title: Comandancia Suprema de EPC advierte a belicistas militares titeres de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Comandancia Suprema de EPC advierte a belicistas militares titeres de Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 una siguiente informacion urgente:
					Por la tarde del 20 de agosto, en la parte centro-occidental del frente volvio a ocurrir una grave provocacion militar de los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea.
					
					So pretexto ilogico del lanzamiento de un proyectil por nuestro ejercito hacia la parte surena, los belicistas surcoreanos titeres dispararon 36 obuses contra los puestos de la policia civil del EPC.
					
					6 proyectiles cayeron en cercania de los puestos 542 y 543 y 15, en la de los 250 y 251, debido a lo cual no hubo ninguna perdida de nuestro ejercito.
					
					Pero, el presente disparo salvaje contra nuestro sagrado territorio, puesto de la defensa a la patria deviene una grave provocacion militar nunca perdonable.
					
					La gravedad de la situacion reside en que la capa militar titere perpetro sin vacilacion tal provocacion militar sin confirmar todavia el lugar original de disparo de la artilleria del EPC, ni punto de caida de proyectil que se deberia estar en su zona, ni distinguir que el proyectiles disparados en que la parte surcoreana insiste como lo nuestro fuera de canon antiaereo o bala de rifle o proyectil-cohete.
					
					Hace unos dias, los belicistas surcoreanos reanudaron en todo el frente la radioemision psicologica contra la RPDC bajo el pretexto de la explosion de una mina sospechosa y hoy, lanzaron innumerables proyectiles contra nuestra parte sin fundamento claro, lo cual es precisamente la imprudente furia provocativa de los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana.
					
					En relacion con tal grave situacion creada, fue convocada por la noche del dia 20 una reunion ampliada de emergencia de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Ahora, estamos observando agudamente la actitud del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea con respecto a ultimatum del Estado Mayor General del EPC de que pasara a la fuerte accion militar si no se interrumpe dentro de 48 horas la radioemision psicologica anti-RPDC ni se retiren todos los medios psicologicos.
					
					Esta imprudente provocacion debe ser castigada debidamente.
					
					Los belicistas militares surcoreanos tienen que actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta del animo vengativo de los oficiales y soldados enfuriados de la unidad combinada del frente del EPC.
